title: associatedResource
description: Other resources which are directly related to the subject resource such as parent, child, or sibling datasets or projects.

associationType.description: Identifies how the associated resource is related to the subject resource such as 'is a component of', 'larger work citation', 'cross reference', etc.

initiativeType.description: Identifies type of initiative under which the resource was produced - the activity that resulted in the resource.

resourceType.description: Identifies the type of resource, such as: a dataset, study, publication, etc.

metadataCitation.description: Citation for the associated resource metadata.
